subject: Smile Education - Upload Your Documents
message:
Hi Joel Baker,

Thank you for registering with Smile Education!

To proceed, please upload the following documents:
- Proof of Identity (e.g. passport or driver’s license)
- Proof of Address (e.g. utility bill, bank statement)
- Qualification Certificates
- DBS Check (Disclosure and Barring Service)

If you need help with the DBS check, follow the instructions in the form. Let us know if you get stuck!
